segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, To specify the type of transaction contained within the message.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, To indicate whether the transaction should be processed as a temporary or permanent change to the policy.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide coded attributes that describe the type of business transaction, such as 'Quotation Type'.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To provide contact information for a party who provided authorisation for the business transaction.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide references for the transaction, such as 'Quote Authorisation Reference', 'Broker Transaction Reference', 'Insurer Transaction Reference' etc.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To identify the total number of transactions in a set of related transactions for one risk or policy.

segment.name: Sequence details
segment.documentation: SEQ, To identify the sequence number of this transaction in a set of transactions for one risk or policy.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates for the transaction, such as 'Response Date', 'Transaction Date', 'Transaction Expiry Date'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify the software which created the business transaction contained within this message.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify a software supplier that provided software used in the creation of the business transaction as well as the transaction originator and addressee.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To provide declarations about the software supplier, such as accreditation.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments that provide details of one particular software component or product.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, Contains a reference to identify a software component or product.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates for the software component, such as 'Date Installed' and 'Date Effective'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify and specify the policy package and product.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, Identifies an insurance package, product or scheme.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify identification numbers for the policy, such as 'Broker Risk Reference' and 'Insurer's Policy Number'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains dates relating to the insurance policy, such as 'Inception Date', 'Expiry Date', 'Renewal Date'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains coded attributes relating to the policy, such as 'Policy Accounting Type', 'Policy Status', 'Cancellation Reason'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the policy, such as 'Brokerage Percent', 'Percentage of Co-insurance'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary values relating to the policy, such as 'Maximum Value At Any One Location', 'Commission Amount'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations for the policy, such as 'Is the policy renewable?', 'Is the broker the holding broker?'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the policy, such as 'Number Of Drivers Covered', 'Maximum Number Of Vehicles At Any One Location'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To specify policy endorsements and to convey text variables with which to complete the endorsement text; and to provide text descriptions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group giving details of documents that have been provided in addition to the message to support the business transaction; or requests for such documents.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, Provides details of a document needed to support the business transaction.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide coded attributes that relate to the document, such as whether the document is open or closed.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide a text description of the document.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: To indicate premiums and excesses that apply at policy level.

segment.name: Premium calculation component details
segment.documentation: PCC, To identify one premium or component that applies to the policy, such as 'Gross Premium', 'Policy Excess'.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Provides a coded indication of how the premium component group is to be processed, such as 'Added', 'Deleted', 'Replaced'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, Contains monetary values associated with the premium component, such as 'Gross Premium', 'Base Premium', 'Loading or Discount Amount'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, Contains percentages associated with the premium component, such as 'Loading or Discount Percentage'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, Contains quantities associated with the premium component, such as 'Loading or Discount Points'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains dates associated with the premium component, such as 'Review Date'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To specify policy endorsements and to convey text variables with which to complete the endorsement text.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: To specify excesses that apply to the policy.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To identify the type of excess, such as 'Compulsory', 'Voluntary'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify the amount of excess as a percentage.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, Contains monetary values associated with the excess, such as 'Excess Amount', 'Maximum Excess Amount', 'Minimum Excess Amount'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To describe the reason for the excess.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: QRS-FTX-SG8-SG9-SG10-SG12 To provide information relating to the parties involved in the insurance policy.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To provide the name details of one party related to the policy, such as 'Insurer', 'Broker', 'Insured' and 'Driver'.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the party is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes for the party, such as 'Gender', 'Marital Status', 'Legal Status', 'VAT Status'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify the percentage of liability for Value Added Tax (VAT or TVA).

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references associated with the party, such as 'VAT registration number', 'SIRENE code'.

segment.name: Employment details
segment.documentation: EMP, To specify occupations or trades for the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains dates associated with the party, such as 'Birth date', 'Date of national residency', 'Registered disabled date'.

segment.name: Membership details
segment.documentation: MEM, To specify details of professional bodies to which the party belongs, such as motoring organisations.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, Contains quantities associated with the party, such as 'Number of children', 'Number of vehicles owned', 'Number of vehicles accessible'.

segment.name: Relationship
segment.documentation: REL, To specify the relationship of the party to the proposer.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To specify the place of birth of the party.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, Contains declarations made by the party, such as 'Any convictions?', 'Any claims?', 'Any disabilities?'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide a text description where any of the party's coded attributes indicate that text will be provided.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: To provide addresses for the party and associated dates.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To specify details of one address for the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains the date that the party was established at the address.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: Contains details of contacts for the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To identify one contact for a party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide details of communication numbers for a contact.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: FTX-SG11 A group of segments that provides details of historical events related to the party, such as claims and convictions.

segment.name: Event
segment.documentation: EVE, To identify one event that has relevance to a party's insurance history.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the historical event is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, Contains declarations about the historical event, such as 'Claim made for loss?' and 'Was no claims bonus affected?'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, Contains references related to the historical event, such as 'Claim number', 'Broker loss reference'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains coded attributes related to the historical event, such as 'Cause Code', 'Consequence Code'.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To specify the cover that applied at the time of the historical event.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To provide details of monetary amounts relating to the historical event, such as 'Claim Amount', 'Fine Amount'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the historical event, such as 'Loss Date', 'Conviction Date'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities related to the historical event, such as 'Conviction Penalty Points', 'Total Licence Penalty Points'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To provide percentages related to the historical event, such as 'Percentage of Responsibility', 'Percentage of Disability'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide text descriptions relating to the historical event.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group giving details of the insurer and broker for the party's historical claim.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party that played a role in a historical claim, such as insurer and broker.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide an address for a party related to the historical claim.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide references for the party and the historical claim.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To specify a contact at the party who handles the historical claim.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication numbers for the historical claim party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: To provide details of licences held by a party.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, To identify one licence held by a party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains dates related to the licence, such as 'Issue Date', 'Expiry Date'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded restrictions that apply to a licence.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To indicate the location of the authority that issued the licence.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide a text description of the licence.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: To provide details of total premiums and total amounts to be paid.

segment.name: Payment terms
segment.documentation: PYT, To specify one payment plan.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains dates related to the payment plan, such as 'Instalment Start Date', 'Instalment Payment day-of-month'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains coded attributes related to the payment, such as 'Payment method', 'Collection Responsibility'.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, To identify the financial account from which payment is being made.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, Contains references related to the payment plan, such as 'Instalment Agreement Number'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the payment, such as 'Interest Rate', 'Early Payment Discount'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: To identify parties involved in the payment.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, Identifies one party making payments.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, Contains the address of the party making payment, or the address of the payer's bank.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: Contains details of payments to be made under the payment plan.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, The monetary value of a payment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, Contains the date or dates when the payment or instalments are due.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains the payment method for a particular payment, if different from the main payment method for the payment plan, as may occur with the first payment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: To provide details of additions and deductions (taxes) to the premium.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, To identify one premium tax, fee or commission.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To provide monetary values for the premium addition or deduction as well as the base premium.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To specify the location of the tax authority.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify the premium addition or deduction as a percentage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 17: FTX-SG18-SG19-SG20-SG21-SG23 To provide information relating to vehicles involved in the insurance contract and the insurance cover they have or are applying for.

segment.name: Risk object type
segment.documentation: ROD, To specify one vehicle or a category of vehicles (for fleets).

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the vehicle is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify reference numbers related to the vehicle, such as 'Registration Number', 'VIN Number', 'Engine Number'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the vehicle, such as 'First Registered Date', 'Date Purchased'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the vehicle, such as 'Fuel Type', 'Body Type', 'Owner Code', 'Colour Code'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities related to the vehicle, such as 'Number of Seats', 'Odometer Reading', 'Engine Power'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary values relating to the vehicle, such as 'Market Value', 'Paid Value', 'Agreed Value'.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, To specify measurements relating to the vehicle, such as 'Maximum Movement Height and Depth'.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To specify addresses or locations where the vehicle is garaged, kept and used.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the vehicle, such as 'Premium Rate per Vehicle'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To provide declarations about the vehicle, such as 'Hazardous Goods Carried?', 'Vehicle Used For Transportation of Employees Only?'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information relating to the vehicle where it has been inadequately described by code.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: A group to provide information about parties that have an interest in the vehicle, such as owner, leasing company, keeper.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party that has an interest in a vehicle.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Coded indication of how the interested party should be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To specify the address of the interested party.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, Contains a description of the interest.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group to specify details of security devices fitted to the vehicle.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, To identify one security device.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Coded indication of how the security device is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the security device, such as 'Accreditation Code', 'Installer Status'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify the installation date.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify parties that manufactured and installed the security device.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To provide coded declarations relating to the security device, such as 'Security Device Certificate Seen by Broker?'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the security device, such 'Certificate Reference'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information about the security device.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: To provide details of insurance certificates and declarations.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, To identify one type of insurance certificate or declaration.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify the reason for issue of an insurance certificate or declaration.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify start and end dates for the certificate and dates upon which the declaration must be made.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify a percentage for the certificate.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information about the certificate or declaration.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: FTX-SG22 A group that provides claims history for the vehicle.

segment.name: Event
segment.documentation: EVE, To identify one previous claim that has relevance to the vehicle's insurance cover.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the claim group is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, Contains coded declarations about the previous claim, such as 'Claim made for loss?' and 'Was No Claims Bonus affected?'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, Contains references related to the vehicle's claim, such as 'Claim Number', 'Broker Loss Reference'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains coded attributes related to the vehicle's claim, such as 'Cause Code', 'Consequence Code'.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To specify the cover that applied to the vehicle at the time of the claim.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To provide details of monetary amounts relating to the vehicle's claim, such as 'Loss Amount', 'Claim Amount'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the vehicle's claim, such as 'Incident date', 'Claim Paid Date'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities related to the vehicle's claim.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To provide percentages related to the vehicle's claim, such as 'Percentage of Responsibility'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional text description relating to the vehicle's claim.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 22: A group giving details of the handling insurer and broker at the time of the previous claim.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party that played a role in the vehicle's claim, such as insurer and broker.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide an address for a party related to the previous claim.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide references for the party and the previous claim.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To specify a contact at the party who handles the claim.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication numbers for the previous claim party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 23: SG26-SG30-SG31 A group of segments used to proved details of cover that applies to the vehicle.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To identify one insurance cover that applies to a vehicle.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how this cover is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates for the cover, such as 'Commencement Date', 'Expiry Date'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references for the cover, such as 'Cover Reference', 'Add-On Policy Number'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes of the cover, such as 'Class of Use'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify coded declarations about the cover, such as 'Foreign Use Included?', 'Cover Excluded?'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify limits of cover by quantity, such as 'Number Of Seats', 'Maximum Number Of Drivers'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide descriptions and wordings for the cover.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 24: To provide monetary values related to the insurance cover, such as premium, commission, tax.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To identify and specify one monetary value related to the insurance cover.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify the percentage related to the previous MOA segment if it was used to indicate commission or tax.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To indicate the country in which tax is payable.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments used to indicate additional or add-on risks to the standard cover, such as personal belongings and in-car entertainment.

segment.name: Risk object type
segment.documentation: ROD, To identify one additional or add-on risk.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how this additional risk is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary values relating to the additional risk, such as 'Value', 'Sum Insured'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 26: A group that contains the premium calculation components that are used to derive the premium for the cover.

segment.name: Component details
segment.documentation: COD, To identify a set of premium calculation components.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the set of premium calculation components should be processed, such as 'Replace Set', 'Add Set' or 'Delete Set'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 27: SG28-SG29 A group of segments to describe how the premium for the cover was derived and conditions that relate to it. It is used for the base premium and all other premium components, such as additions, deductions, loadings and discounts.

segment.name: Premium calculation component details
segment.documentation: PCC, To identify one premium calculation component.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A coded indication of how the premium calculation component is to be processed.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary values related to the premium component, such as 'Base Premium', 'Premium Component Value'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify a premium component as a percentage.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations about the premium component when it is a condition or endorsement, such as 'Has Condition Been Met?', 'Brokers Wording Used?'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify the premium components as a number of units.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the premium component or condition, such as start and end date.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To specify endorsements to the cover and to convey text variables with which to complete the endorsement text.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 28: A group that provides details of non-standard or amended cover for drivers.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one driver for which amended cover applies.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To specify details of the amended cover for the driver identified by the previous PNA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 29: To specify excesses that apply to the cover for a vehicle.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To identify one type of excess.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, Contains details of the excess when expressed as a percentage.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, Contains monetary amounts related to the excess, such as 'Excess Value', 'Minimum Excess Amount', 'Maximum Excess Amount'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide free format or coded text for the excess.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 30: A group that provides information about additional insurers for a cover, assistance companies, passengers named under personal accident insurance and previous insurers for this cover.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party associated with the cover.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the party associated with the cover is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the party, such as 'Policy Number', 'Assistance Contract Number', 'Previous Policy Number'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the party associated to the cover, such as 'Start Date', 'End Date'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary values related to the party associated with the cover, such as 'Premium Amount', 'Cover Limit'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the party associated with the cover, such as 'Percentage of Driving Time'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities related to the party associated with the cover, such as 'Number of Previous Claims'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations about the party associated with the cover, such as 'Party is main Driver under this cover?', 'Party Is Excluded from this cover?'.

segment.name: Relationship
segment.documentation: REL, To specify the relationship that this party has with the proposer.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 31: PCC-LOC-FTX-SG32 A group that provides the history details for claims against one insurance cover.

segment.name: Event
segment.documentation: EVE, To identify one claim that has been made against the insurance cover.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Contains a coded indication of how the claim is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy, such as 'Added', 'Deleted' or 'Changed'.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Contains coded attributed relating to the claim, such as 'Cause Code', 'Consequence Code'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the date, such as 'Incident Date', 'Claim Date'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the claim, such as 'Claim Value', 'Amount Paid'.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the claim, such as 'Percentage of Responsibility'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations about the claim, such as 'Bonus/Malus Affected?', 'Claim Fully Settled?'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the claim.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide references relating to the claim, such as 'Claim Number'.

segment.name: Premium calculation component details
segment.documentation: PCC, To specify premium components that this claim gave rise to.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To specify the location of the incident.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional text information about the claim.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 32: To provide information about the holding insurer and broker at the time of the claim.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party for the claim, such as broker and insurer.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide the address for the party associated with the claim.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references for the party and the claim.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To specify a contact at the party who handles the claim.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication numbers for the claim party.

segment.name: Section control
segment.documentation: UNS, A mandatory service segment placed before the first user segment in the detail section to avoid segment collision.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 33: A group that provides details of previous fleet claims experience. This section is only used for commercial fleet insurance.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify the duration of one period of fleet experience.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the fleet experience, such as 'Insurer's Policy Number', 'Broker's Risk Reference'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations for the fleet experience, such as 'Is claims history confirmed?', 'Is foreign use included?'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide text details of why the claims history is unconfirmed (if appropriate).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 34: To provide details for the holding insurer and broker at the time of the fleet experience.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify one party relating to the fleet experience, such as insurer and broker.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide address details for the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To provide a contact name for the party that handles the fleet experience.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication numbers for the party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 35: A group that provides a breakdown of figures for the fleet experience.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Coded indication of whether the breakdown figures should be processed as being the same as at the date of the previous fleet experience or as being updated.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the fleet experience, such as 'Calculated To Date', 'Event Date of Last Claim Included'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the fleet experience, such as 'Total Claims Reported', 'Claims Reported Outstanding Number'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the fleet experience, such as 'Claims Paid and Outstanding Cost', 'Claims Outstanding Cost'.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 36: To provide a breakdown by cover for the fleet experience figures.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To identify one type of insurance cover.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the fleet experience cover breakdown, such as 'Type of Excess Applying', 'Excess Application Code'.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the cover breakdown, such as 'Excess Value', 'Claims Cost Paid'.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the cover breakdown, such as 'Number of Claims', 'Number of Claims Outstanding'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional description of the cover.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 37: To specify individual claim details that occurred during the fleet experience.

segment.name: Event
segment.documentation: EVE, To identify one claim.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, Coded indication of how this claim is to be processed if the message is being used to update a policy.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, Coded attributes relating to the claim, such as 'Cause Code', 'Consequence Code'.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the claim, such as 'Incident Date', 'Claim Date'.

segment.name: Insurance cover description
segment.documentation: ICD, To specify the cover against which this claim was made.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the claim, such as 'Claim Value', 'Paid Amount'.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To specify references for the claim, such as 'Insurer Claim Number', 'Broker Claim Reference'.

segment.name: Query and response
segment.documentation: QRS, To specify declarations about the claim, such as 'Bonus/Malus Affected?'.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional text details about the claim.
